sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Send email to Chief Digital Officer

sys_variable_value.value: New GDPR Breach needs your immediate attention

sys_element_mapping.value:
Dear Chris Harris,

A possible GDPR violation or breach has been reported by Trigger - Record Created➛...➛Name and reviewed by his/her manager Trigger - Record Created➛...➛Name.

It is crucial that you assign the incident and ensure, if required, that the incident is reported to Datatilsynet within 72 hours. The clock is ticking!

To rewiew the breach, click here Flow Variables➛URL2

Warm regards,
ACME Inc.

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Send email to reporter/user that incident is received
Set state to open and assign to CDO Chris Harris
Set record state to pending (wait for "approval")

sys_variable_value.value: comments=Thank you for reporting a possible GDPR breach. We will be in touch by email if we require further information.

sys_variable_value.value: New GDPR Breach needs your immediate attention

sys_element_mapping.value:
Dear Chris Harris,

A possible GDPR violation or breach has been reported by Trigger - Record Created➛...➛Name and reviewed by his/her manager Trigger - Record Created➛...➛Name.

It is crucial that you assign the incident and ensure, if required, that the incident is reported to Datatilsynet within 72 hours. The clock is ticking!

To rewiew the breach, click here Flow Variables➛URL2

Warm regards,
ACME Inc.
